title: Diamond Lakshmi Pendant - Shubh Mangalam
materials: 18K Yellow Gold. Showcasing a brilliance of Round Cut Diamonds (SI Clarity
G Color). The pendant employs a durable prong setting to secure the dazzling stones. The gold is meticulously crafted and finished with a subtle Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Inspired by traditional Indian motifs, the pendant features an elaborate floral pattern. It can be worn as a pendant, and can also act as a detachable Vaddanam piece. The openwork design allows light to filter through, enhancing the diamond's sparkle. Its design incorporates modern flair with classical Indian elements.
colors: Classic combination of White Diamonds and Yellow Gold.
occasions: This diamond Lakshmi pendant is perfect for weddings (kalyanam)
or festive occasions. It is also suitable for a half-saree function or engagement.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship and unique design, making it a treasured heirloom. Blends classic design with the brilliance of diamonds. Versatile and can be styled as a modern necklace pendant or as a belt adornment. Certified authenticity and value from our Hyderabad store.
